name: gateway-lite
description: An HTTP/HTTPS/HTTP 2 frontend express server for proxying to plain HTTP backends. Supports multiple domains, redirect, proxy paths, basic auth and automatic Lets Encrypt certificates

scripts.docker:run: docker run -v "`pwd`/domain:/app/domain" --init -p 8000:8000 -p 3000:3000 gateway-lite:latest --https-port 3000 --port 8000 --cert domain/www.example.com/sni/cert.pem --key domain/www.example.com/sni/key.pem --domain domain

author: James Gardner
